example.title: TypeScript Masterclass - Advanced Types
example.content:
## Key Concepts

- Union types: Allow variables to be one of several types
- Intersection types: Combine multiple types into one
- Conditional types: Types that depend on conditions

## Code Examples

```typescript
type ApiResponse<T> = T extends string ? string : T extends number ? number : never;
```

## Takeaways

- Advanced types make code more type-safe
- Conditional types enable powerful generic patterns

## Next Steps

- Practice with mapped types
- Build a type-safe API client
